sense.def:
Dejanja, ki so
spontaneous
, niso načrtovana ali dogovorjena, temveč storjena zato, ker si to nekdo nenadoma zaželi.

seg.quote: ...a spontaneous display of friendship and affection.
Flo and I decided spontaneously to board a train for Geneva.

sense.def:
Dogodek, ki je
spontaneous
, se zgodi zaradi postopkov znotraj nečesa in ga ne povzročijo zunanji vplivi.

seg.quote: The fuel ignites spontaneously from the heat created by the compression.
